description: Scholarship operated in West Bengal by the Higher Education department, for students who are not able to afford their fees.
benefits: Non NET M.Phil./Non NET Ph.D. ₹ 5000/- / ₹ 8000/- respectively
UG (Engg.), PG (Engg.) And Other Professional Courses (AICTE Approved) ₹ 5000/-
UG (Medical-Degree) And Diploma Courses ₹ 5000/- and ₹ 1500/- respectively
eligibility: Student must be a domicile of West Bengal.
Applicant family annual income must not more than ₹ 2,50,000/-.
HS: Minimum 60% marks in the Madhyamik Pariksha exam. Only students from the West Bengal Board of Secondary Education are eligible.
Diploma Courses: Minimum 60% marks in the qualifying exam (excluding optional subjects). Courses must be approved by AICTE/PCI/CoA and affiliated to WBSCT&VE&SD.
Undergraduate (UG): Minimum 60% marks in aggregate in the HS exam conducted by WBCHSE/Madrasha Siksha Parishad.
Postgraduate (PG): Minimum 53% marks in the Honours subject at the graduation level.
Kanyashree scholarship recipients (married/unmarried) pursuing PG in Science, Arts, and Commerce with a minimum 45% in their undergraduate degree are eligible. They don't need to submit income proof.
Full-time M.Phil. or Ph.D. research scholars registered after April 1, 2017, are eligible (up to a maximum of 2 years for M.Phil. and 4 years for Ph.D.).
Financial assistance stops for NET-LS scholars upon their appointment as teachers
documents: Mark sheet of Madhyamik Examination or its equivalent (Both sides).
Mark sheet of last Board/Council/University/College examination (Both sides).
Income certificate of family (Not Applicable for Kanyashree).
Domicile certificate as Aadhaar ID/Voter ID/Ration card/Certificate Issued by concerned authority.
Scanned copy of Bank Passbook (1st Page, containing A/C No. and IFSC).
Declaration by Head of the Institution regarding the cause of Year Gap.
Copy of the Marksheet of the last examination in the present course of study (Renewal Application).
Admission receipt for the promotion to the next higher class (Renewal Application).
